name: Mizuho Securities
overview: Mizuho Securities Co., Ltd. operates as a financial instruments firm primarily in Japan. The company engages in the trade of securities, securities brokerage activities, underwriting and distribution of securities, subscription and distribution of securities, and private placement of securities. It markets equities, bonds, investment trusts, and insurance, as well as financial services as wrap accounts to individual clients. The company also offers various financial products, such as foreign stocks, foreign currency bonds, structured bonds, and derivative instruments. In addition, it provides various investment banking products and services comprising equity and bond underwriting, support for share offerings, investor relations consulting to an assortment of financial and capital strategy advisory services, mergers and acquisition advisory, and structured finance, as well as assists its clients in devising management strategies and raising funds. The company serves individuals or institutional investors, non-financial companies, financial institutions, and public corporations. It also operates in China, Singapore, the United Kingdom, Switzerland, and the United States. The company was founded in 1917 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan. Mizuho Securities Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Mizuho Corporate Bank, Ltd.
